name: Last Game Of The Year 2020 (Last GOTY 2020)
name_original: Last Game Of The Year 2020 (Last GOTY 2020)
description: Sequel to Last Game of the Year 2018 and Last Game of the Decade 2019. A hidden object game where you go hunting for stickers. It's scaled down from the previous one, because of time constraints, but there's still plenty to see and do.
